unnormalised: Arrey yaar, the bus to Shimla leaves at 6:30 AM from ISBT Delhi. But if you miss that, there's another one at 8 in the morning from Majnu ka Tilla. Better book in advance though, especially around 15/08! You can check the RedBus app, usually shows the accurate timing. Last time I went, the bus was delayed by 1.5 hrs though, so keep that in mind!
normalised: Arrey yaar, the bus to Shimla leaves at six thirty A-M from I-S-B-T Delhi. But if you miss that, there is another one at eight in the morning from Majnu ka Tilla. Better book in advance though, especially around fifteenth August! You can check the RedBus app, usually shows the accurate timing. Last time I went, the bus was delayed by one and a half hours though, so keep that in mind!
